function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure by face-to-face contact within a social distance radius","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission through close proximity interactions.","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures and use personal protective equipment such as masks.","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring technology to track and enforce social distancing.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff.","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Exposure by being in the same room","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread in enclosed spaces with multiple occupants.","Mitigation":"Improve indoor ventilation, reduce occupant density, and enforce mask-wearing.","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, occupancy tracking technology, and ventilation control systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff.","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities."}]}
